conditions.name: Major Depressive Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: SSRIs like Sertraline (50-200mg) or Fluoxetine (20-80mg), SNRIs like Venlafaxine (75-225mg). Combined with psychotherapy, lifestyle changes, support groups, regular exercise.

conditions.name: Generalized Anxiety Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Escitalopram (10-20mg), Buspirone (5-10mg), or Alprazolam (0.25-0.5mg) for acute anxiety. Combined with cognitive behavioral therapy, relaxation techniques, stress management.

conditions.name: Bipolar Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Lithium (300-900mg), Valproate (500-1000mg), or Lamotrigine (25-200mg) as mood stabilizers. Quetiapine (50-800mg) for acute episodes. Combined with psychotherapy, lifestyle management, support system, regular schedule.

conditions.name: Post-Traumatic Stress Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Sertraline (50-200mg), Paroxetine (20-50mg), or Prazosin (1-15mg) for nightmares. Combined with trauma-focused therapy, support groups, stress management techniques.

conditions.name: Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder
conditions.suggestion: Common tablets: Fluvoxamine (50-300mg), Clomipramine (25-250mg), or Fluoxetine (20-80mg). Combined with exposure and response prevention therapy, cognitive behavioral therapy.
